title: D3 Scatterplot Matrices
text: port Mike Bostock’s D3 scatter plot matrix code htmlwidgets framework. minor adjustments, including addition tooltips. also consider pairedVis() function healthvis package. Take test run (can upload data).

title: D3 Scatterplot Matrices

title: D3 Scatterplot Matrices
text: HTML widgets (yet) supported slidify. workaround save widget webpage include webpage slidify using iframe:
code: ```{r, results='asis',echo=FALSE} require(pairsD3) pd3 = pairsD3(iris) savePairs(pd3, 'pD3.html') cat('<iframe src="pD3.html"> </iframe>') ```

title: D3 scatterplot matrices — pairsD3
D3 scatterplot matrices — pairsD3
code: pairsD3(   x,   group = NULL,   subset = NULL,   labels = NULL,   cex = 3,   width = NULL,   col = NULL,   big = FALSE,   theme = "colour",   opacity = 0.9,   tooltip = NULL,   leftmar = 35,   topmar = 2,   diag = FALSE )

title: D3 scatterplot matrices — pairsD3
text: x coordinates points given numeric columns matrix data frame. Logical factor columns converted numeric way data.matrix . group optional vector specifying group observation belongs .  Used tooltips colouring observations. subset optional vector specifying subset observations used plotting. Useful large number observations, can specify random subset. labels names variables (column names x used default). cex magnification plotting symbol (default=3) width width (height) plot viewed externally. col optional (hex) colour levels group vector. big logical parameter.  Prevents inadvertent plotting huge data sets.  Default limit 10 variables, plot 10 set big=TRUE. theme character parameter specifying whether theme colour colour (default) black white bw. opacity numeric 0 1. opacity plotting symbols (default 0.9). tooltip optional vector tool tip displayed hovering observation. can include basic html. leftmar space left margin topmar space bottom margin diag logical, whether main diagonal plotted (scatter plot variables ).

title: D3 scatterplot matrices — pairsD3

text: Save pairsD3 graph HTML file sharing others. HTML can include dependencies adjacent directory can bundle dependencies HTML file (via base64 encoding).

Save a pairs plot to an HTML file — savePairs
text: pairs plot save (e.g. result calling function pairsD3). file File save HTML selfcontained Whether save HTML single self-contained file (external resources base64 encoded) file external resources placed adjacent directory.
